Question.Subject: "Order taken" status on Play.com. How long can it last?
Question.Content: Hello. I have an order on Play.com whose status is stuck on "order taken" since almost 6 weeks now (ordered on January 24). It's not the first time this situation happens and usually I just give up after a month and a half and I buy somewhere else. But this time, I'd like to see how long it can stay that way. I just wondered if some users had some experience about this, did they have to wait a really long time (like 2 months or more) until their order finally got shipped?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Happened to me - I emailed them and asked what the hold up was, they sent me and email straight away and shipped the item

Answer.Content: Happened to me - I emailed them and asked what the hold up was, they sent me and email straight away and shipped the item

Hi I have ordered about 30 or more items from Play.com If the Items have been in stock I have usually received them within 3 days If they are pre-ordered I usually get themwithin two days of them becoming available.
When you first order you get an email telling you the item as gone for packing then later you get a second email telling you that the order as been posted, You can also go to the site and track your order. I suggest you contact Pay.pal and sort your problem out They do not take the payment from your account until it has been posted
